name: Smushing Planets
description:
Smash little planets together to make slightly less little planets in this trippy stationary experience created for VR Gam Jam 2021. 

Take two planets of the same size and smash them together to get the next size. Keep smashing same sized planets together until you get the biggest little planet to win!

Oculus PCVR only for now. Tested and played on the Quest 2 via Oculus Link.
